publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2720 Stewart Stevenson: Reference to Ethnic Origins within Parliamentary Motion—That the Parliament regrets the references to ethnic origin within motion S2M-2719 lodged by Tommy Sheridan MSP; believes that people in Scotland and elsewhere should be valued whatever their ethnic origin, and supports all efforts to eliminate the scourge of racial intolerance wherever it occurs. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2720 Stewart Stevenson: Reference to Ethnic Origins within Parliamentary Motion—That the Parliament regrets the references to ethnic origin within motion S2M-2719 lodged by Tommy Sheridan MSP; believes that people in Scotland and elsewhere should be valued whatever their ethnic origin, and supports all efforts to eliminate the scourge of racial intolerance wherever it occurs. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Jim Mather, Rob Gibson, Mrs Margaret Ewing
S2M-2720 Reference to Ethnic Origins within Parliamentary Motion (lodged on 21 April 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2720 Reference to Ethnic Origins within Parliamentary Motion (lodged on 21 April 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
